mod.harmonymod.name: Harmony
mod.harmonymod.description: Universal worldgen and structure claim mediator.
harmonymod.config.logAllClaims: Log all biome/structure claims and permission checks
harmonymod.config.priorityMods: Priority mod IDs (comma-separated, higher priority claims)
harmonymod.config.blockVanillaBiomeChang: Block vanilla biome changes unless claimed
harmonymod.config.blockVanillaStructureC: Block vanilla structure changes unless claimed
